item.description:
Since we're already visiting the art gallery, we need to make our way around the Aidekman Arts Center. Let's show some support for Barbara Grossman and the first drama production of the 09-10 season - Kiss Me, Kate! We're planning to attend the opening night performance and reception on October 29th. Tickets are $7 with a Tufts ID. Contact the Balch Arena Box Office to purchase tickets. Additional information is below.

KISS ME, KATE
Music and lyrics by Cole Porter
Book by Sam and Bella Spewack
Directed by Barbara W. Grossman
October 29-31 and November 5-7, 2009 at 8:00 p.m.
November 7 at 2:00 p.m.
Tickets: $7.00 Tufts ID
$7.00 subscribers/seniors
$12.00 general
10/29 - $7.00 tickets/opening night reception
11/5- $1.00 night
item.name: Kiss Me Kate - a Tufts production
